pkgmetadata.longdescription: Intensity Analysis of Spatial Point Patterns on Complex Networks // Tools to analyze point patterns in space occurring over planar network structures derived from graph-related intensity measures for undirected, directed, and mixed networks. This package is based on the following research: Eckardt and Mateu (2018) doi:10.1080/10618600.2017.1391695. Eckardt and Mateu (2021) doi:10.1007/s11749-020-00720-4.
